entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 17.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 17.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 93 %

Wind: ENE 10 km/h

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 10.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 this evening then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High 19.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 19. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
